## Design Constraints
<!-- Important: BC64Keys follows these principles -->
- **Single-file architecture:** Core app stays in one file for auditability
- **No external dependencies:** Pure Swift/SwiftUI only
- **Privacy-first:** No network features, no telemetry
- **Simplicity:** Prefer simple solutions over complex ones

Does your feature request align with these principles?
